piXedfit_spectrophotometric¶

piXedfit.piXedfit_spectrophotometric.match_specphoto(specphoto_file=None, spec_sigma=3.5, name_saved_randmod=None, nproc=10, del_wave_nebem=10.0, name_out_fits=None)¶

Function for correcting wavelength-dependent mismatch between IFS data and the multiwavelength photometric data.

Parameters

  • specphoto_file – Input spec+photo FITS file, which is an output from previous step: specphoto_califagalexsdss2masswise or specphoto_mangagalexsdss2masswise.

  • spec_sigma – (default: 3.5) Spectral resolution of the IFS data in Angstrom.

  • name_saved_randmod – FITS file that contains random model SED templates to be used for fitting photometric SED. The best-fit model spectra will then be used as references for correcting wavelength-dependent mismatch between the IFS spectra and the photometric SEDs.This FITS file should have the same format as the output of the piXedfit.piXedfit_model.save_models() function.

  • nproc – Number of cores for calculation.

  • del_wave_nebem – (default: 15.0 Angstrom) The range (+/-) around emission lines in the model spectra that will be removed in producing continuum-only spectrum. This will be used as reference in correcting the wavelength-dependent mismatch between the IFS spectra and photometric SEDs.

  • name_out_fits – (optional) Desired name for the output FITS file.

piXedfit.piXedfit_spectrophotometric.specphoto_califagalexsdss2masswise(photo_fluxmap=None, califa_file=None, pixsize_califa=1.0, spec_sigma=2.6, name_out_fits=None)¶

Function for matching (spatially on pixel scales) between IFS data cube from CALIFA and the multiwavelength imaging data (12 bands from GALEX, SDSS, 2MASS, and WISE).

Parameters

  • photo_fluxmap – Input 3D data cube of photometry. This should have the same format as the output of piXedfit.piXedfit_images.images_processing.flux_map().

  • califa_file – Input CALIFA data cube.

  • pixsize_califa – (default: 1.0) Pixel size (in arcsec) of CALIFA data cube.

  • spec_sigma – (default: 2.6) Spectral resolution (in Angstrom) of CALIFA IFS data.

  • name_out_fits – Name of output FITS file.

piXedfit.piXedfit_spectrophotometric.specphoto_mangagalexsdss2masswise(photo_fluxmap=None, manga_file=None, pixsize_manga=0.5, spec_sigma=3.5, name_out_fits=None)¶

Function for matching (spatially on pixel scales) between IFS data cube from MaNGA and the multiwavelength imaging data (12 bands from GALEX, SDSS, 2MASS, and WISE).

Parameters

  • photo_fluxmap – Input 3D data cube of photometry. This should have the same format as the output of piXedfit.piXedfit_images.images_processing.flux_map().

  • manga_file – Input MaNGA data cube.

  • pixsize_manga – (default: 0.5) Pixel size (in arcsec) of MaNGA data cube.

  • spec_sigma – (default: 3.5) Spectral resolution (in Angstrom) of MaNGA IFS data.

  • name_out_fits – Name of output FITS file.
